extension_description.message: Shows updated prices for stocks and indexes, including international ones. You can configure which stocks you want to see. The data is obtained from Yahoo Finance.

help_standalone.message: Click here to get to show your stocks in a new tab

empty_add.message: Add some stocks in the options page

help_export.message: The URL produced here can be used to recreate the list of stocks from scratch.

help_start.message: Start writing the name of the stock, a dropdown menu with possible completions will appear.

help_comp.message: Select a completion to add it to the list.

help_drag.message: Drag a stock by the arrow to change its position in the list. Click on the cross to delete it.
